Text: Thanks for nothing, spetrograms indicate that disk 1 is missing hi freq.(FAKE) Track 5, dics 1 is a dead give away. At the end of the track, freq. suddenly appears again. Lots of clipping. DON"T WASTE YOUR BANDWIDTH ON THIS TORRENT! IT IS RUBBISH. Disk 2 has the freq. but still too much clipping!

If you would like to check your entire flac library for clipping very easily go here: http://forum.audacityteam.org/viewtopic.php?f=48&t=69430&start=10, last post on page. Take the bash script, apply replaygain to all your flacs and run the script. You'll see that about %45 of all downloads from anywehre are clipped, some light some massively heavy. This script does not miss a single clipped waveform.
